snippet: J & R, a popular electronics and music store in Lower Manhattan, abruptly shut, at least for now, and the building housing Pearl Paint is for sale.
abstract: Closing of popular electronics and music store J & R is received by longtime customers as a shock; closing coincides with news that Pearl Paint, art supply store on Canal Street, had put its building up for sale, underscoring change in retail landscape of Lower Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: J & R, a popular electronics and music store in Lower Manhattan, abruptly shut, at least for now, and the building housing Pearl Paint is for sale.

headline.seo: J & R and Pearl Paint Reflect Changing Retail Landscape
headline.main: Patrons of 2 Stores Ponder a Loss of Music and Color
headline.print_headline: Patrons of 2 Stores Ponder a Loss of Music and Color
